3FE0FFBD.Line5.125E0E: As promised, your reward. My recipe for an antidote. If my wine knocks you out, here’s the fix for the morning after. Ha.

675D55FB.Line3.125E0E: Just the kick my Scorpion Wine needs. Stuff’s not for the faint of heart.

8ED9AC39.Line1.125E0E: Let’s see. (deep sniff) Ahhh. Now that’s the good stuff.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “I found the venom glands you wanted.”
